member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC1
member.summary: Describes the blend state for a Direct3D 10.1 device.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC1.AlphaToCoverageEnable
member.summary: Determines whether or not to use the alpha-to-coverage multisampling technique when setting a render-target pixel.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC1.IndependentBlendEnable
member.summary: Set to TRUE to enable independent blending in simultaneous render targets. If set to FALSE, only the RenderTarget[0] members are used. RenderTarget[1..7] are ignored.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC1.RenderTarget
member.summary: An array of render-target-blend descriptions (see ); these correspond to the eight rendertargets that can be set to the output-merger stage at one time.
